clinical_study.brief_title: Fecal Microbiota Transplantation Improves Nutritional State of Patients With Crohn's Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Fecal Microbiota Transplantation Combined Enteral Nutrition Therapy Contribute to Nutritional Improvement of Patients With Crohns' Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: Patients with Crohns' disease are always complicated with malnutrition. This trial aimed to assess whether FMT accompanied by enteral nutrition (EN) can make contributions to patients with Crohns' disease.

other_outcome.description: aspiration of different gastric content, infection and allergy, etc.
